name: Antisocial distancing
description:
Control your robot by right-clicking where you want to go. 

Drag and drop cards to summon helpful friends, or  regenerate your health and energy.

Made with G_usk_a, acroix, Nywes,  5ole1l,  and Theo.

Submission for the Small Weekend Jam.

Theme compliance (Limited Capacity):

  • The robot's capacity is limited IE energy
  • No more cards can be played if the arena already exceeds maximum capacity (social distancing duh)

Thanks to these artists for most of the assets!

https://kvsr.itch.io/brushedfxseries003

https://pipoya.itch.io/pipoya-free-vfx-light-pillar

https://cafedraw.itch.io/fantasy-card-assets

https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/mega-pixel-art-32x32-px-icons-sprite-sheet

https://mounirtohami.itch.io/26-animated-pixelart-robots
